description: T1. Tree of Heaven (Ailanthus altissima)Opposite no.30Fell to ground level, remove stump and replant with x1 standard 12-14cm in girth 4m carpinus betulus 'Lucas' in similar position. T2. Holly (ilex aquifolium)Opposite no.30No work required. T3. Tree of heaven (Ailanthus altissima)Opposite no.29 & 30Self seeded tree. Fell to ground level. Fell stem suckers to ground level, remove stumps and replant with x1 standard 12-14cm in girth 4m carpinus betulus 'Lucas' in similar position. T4. Sycamore (Acer psuedoplatanus)Opposite no.28 & 29Semi mature tree. Crown lift over footpath to 3m and over highway to 5m. T5. Tree of Heaven (Ailanthus altissima)Opposite no.27Fell to ground level, remove stump and replant with x1 standard 12-14cm in girth 4m carpinus betulus 'Lucas' in similar position. T6. Holly (ilex aquifolium)Opposite no.26Remove stem with low vigour, retain healthy stems
